Load the LncFinder and associated packages for workflow...
```{r}
install.packages(c("readr", "tidyverse", "LncFinder", "GenomicRanges", "Biostrings", "rtracklayer"))

```
```{r}
library(GenomicFeatures)
library(GenomicRanges)
library(Biostrings)
library(rtracklayer)
library(LncFinder)

```
